strangeProducts.name: Cat Butt Tissue Holder
strangeProducts.details: These cats are just trying to help out by keeping your tissue close at hand! Standard square tissue box fits inside.

strangeProducts.name: T-Rex Garden Gnome
strangeProducts.details: The terrifying T-Rex is a defender of humanity with a taste for gnomes, a funny take on the conventional garden gnome. It's a fun addition to any landscaping, but looks great in your home, garden or office, too.

strangeProducts.name: Desktop Refridgerator
strangeProducts.details: Now when you say you need a cold one, you can mean it literally, with one (1) single refrigerated beverage at your fingertips.

strangeProducts.name: Nicolas Cage Sequin Pillowcase
strangeProducts.details: The only thing better than a festive red sparkly pillowcase is one that morphs into Nicolas Cage's face with the satisfying swipe of your hand.

strangeProducts.name: Hand Squirrel
strangeProducts.details: While it's all well and good to have a variety of puppets at your disposal, few things rival this strangely-realistic hand squirrel.
